about_the_game:
Current Features

  • LAN and Online multiplayer, with a global server browser
  • 5 first-party maps
  • 6 Primary weapons, plus sidearms
  • 12 Throwable weapons
  • 16 Gear items
  • Full spectating features with data capture sockets
  • Strafe-jumps, wall kicks, ramp jumps, and double-jumps, including skiing down slopes
  • High-performance netcode allowing comfortable play up to 140ms
  • Skin/model customization and drops

Upcoming Features

  • Hub maps for practicing jumps, socializing, and arranging matches
  • 7 additional Gangs
  • Full single-player campaign
  • Jump modes
  • Ingame ranking



The weapons in Midnight Guns hit different. Literally. Six primary firearms with unique knockback, armor penetration, and blood loss characteristics give you the right tool for every situation. Not enough for you? No worries, every level is scattered with throwables, from ninja stars to bundles of dynamite to cans full of snakes. Even when your mag is dry, deadly force is always at your fingertips.



Equip yourself with a wide variety of passive Gear in order to put pressure on your opponents, or else respond effectively to their own schemes. Kevlar? Check. Laser sights? Check. Automatic immolation on every throwable weapon? Count on it. The list is expanding all the time, and the tactics are always fresh.


Above all else, high-fidelity tactical gameplay is paramount. Enjoy high framerates, steady frametimes, and effective latency correction to make sure every shot feels just like it should.

content_descriptors.notes: Depicts blood drips and sprays, as well as immolation. All violence depicted is not particularly graphic, and little to no gore is shown.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Quad Q6600
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 5570 or Nvidia 9600 GT (OpenGL 3.0 required)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A madcap tactical team shooter with a high capacity for shenanigans - bullets and baseball bats fly in a fight to control a ruined New York!
